info.author: Konrad Hinsen
info.description:
DomainFinder is an interactive program for the determination and
characterization of dynamical domains in proteins. Its key features
are

 - computational efficiency: even large proteins can be analyzed
   using a desktop computer in a few minutes

 - ease of use: a state-of-the-art graphical user interface

 - export of results for visualization and further analysis
   (VRML, PDB, and MMTK object format)
info.name: DomainFinder
info.html_description:
DomainFinder is an interactive program for the determination and characterization of dynamical domains in proteins. Its key features are

  • computational efficiency: even large proteins can be analyzed using a desktop computer in a few minutes
  • ease of use: a state-of-the-art graphical user interface
  • export of results for visualization and further analysis (VRML, PDB, and MMTK object format)
